bug.author: ZacBlanco
bug.summary: Some fonts in the WebUI on Firefox show up black.
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.0.0 Describe the bug Download the latest version of Firefox on MacOS and open the Alluxio UI and click the "Browse" tab. All of the filesystem entries are black. Nearly impossible to read. Not very usable. To Reproduce
Download the latest version of Firefox Start Alluxio locally alluxio-start.sh local SudoMount go to http://localhost:19999/browse Font color is all black
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3464508/61013284-f2e27680-a336-11e9-882a-4a54b3941e77.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3464508/61013305-02fa5600-a337-11e9-98da-ad4aeae5eed1.png></denchmark-link>
Expected behavior The font colors should be green for filename and white for permissions like they are in Google Chrome <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3464508/61013365-21f8e800-a337-11e9-9cb3-0311cc1da59a.png></denchmark-link>
Urgency Depends on how many people use firefox. Additional context I think it stems from the way the react application loads fonts. Chrome and Firefox handle them differently.
